sec.p: Birds were classified according to their diet using EltonTraits 1.0 database (Wilman et al., 2014). Diet categories were assigned depending on the most common food types ingested by each species and included omnivore, plant seed eating, frugivore–nectarivore or insectivore. We pooled frugivore–nectarivore diets and plant seed‐eating species as herbivores because their sample sizes were low. In relation to migratory status, we classified each species as migrant or resident according to the descriptions provided by the Handbook of the Birds of the World (del Hoyo, Elliott, Sargatal, Christie, & de Juana, 2018). See Supporting Information Appendix S2 for a list of species' numbers per location, including the information on habitat and diet groups.
